long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seamlessly surf on the Web3 using the Dotmundo extension! 

To visit a Web3 website or view your own Web3 website, you currently need a browser extension. That's where the Dotmundo extension steps in! By simply turning on the Dotmundo extension, you can immidiately start surfing on the Web3 by entering a Web3 domain directly into your browser’s search bar and navigate to onchain websites.

Web3 is a collective name for all internet communication that takes place exclusively via peer-to-peer networks such as blockchains. With the Dotmundo extension you can now easily gain access to this revolutionary internet by just entering a Web3 domain directly into your browser’s search bar.

Surf the onchain ecosystem with your Dotmundo extension now!
